title: Help - Account Unaccessable
body:
I have come back from 1-2 months off from League. I tried to log into my account and seemingly the passwords I try are not correct. It is impossible that I have forgotten my password as I have used it for 16 years and it is very complex.

But alas, I have tried to reset my password with a reset email but I am still waiting after 4 days and many, MANY attempts. - Again - The email is 100% correct and would not be a different email.

I have submitted a ticket to Riot, 4 days ago, but still waiting - I have received no response on the issue at all and I have been unable to access my 4 year old League of Legends account for seemingly no reason.

Please help

Thank

replies.body:
Hey Storage Wars OCE,

Please be patient when waiting for a response to your ticket, they will get to it, but it may take several days. Do not make unnecessary comments on the ticket, because it gets pushed to the back of the queue each time it's updated. Please check out the [Protecting Your Account](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201751664-Protecting-Your-Account) and [Recovering Your Account](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201751694-Recovering-Your-Account) articles for more information.

-DTN
